org.dmd.util.exceptions
Class ResultException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.dmd.util.exceptions.ResultException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ResultException
extends java.lang.Exception

The ResultException encapsulates a ResultSet that can be populated with a variety of errors/warning when it's thrown. Once created, add your information to the public result member.

See Also:
Serialized Form

public java.lang.String toString()
Dumps the result set.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Throwable

populate

public void populate(ResultSet rs)
This is a convenience function to populate an existing result set with the contents of this exception. This is a stop gap mechanism until the day we eliminate direct use of result sets.

addError

public void addError(java.lang.String msg)
A convenience method to add a Result.ERROR.

Parameters:
msg - String the error message

addErrorWithStack

public void addErrorWithStack(java.lang.String msg,
                              java.lang.String stack)
A convenience method to add a Result.ERROR with a stack trace in the moreMessages part.

Parameters:
msg - String the error message
stack - String the stack trace

addErrorWithStack

public void addErrorWithStack(java.lang.String msg,
                              java.lang.Exception exception)
A convenience method to add a Result.ERROR with a stack trace in the moreMessages part.

Parameters:
msg - String the error message
exception - The exception whose stack we'll display.

addFatalWithStack

public void addFatalWithStack(java.lang.String msg,
                              java.lang.Exception exception)
A convenience method to add a Result.FATAL with a stack trace in the moreMessages part.

Parameters:
msg - String the error message
exception - The exception whose stack we'll display.

setLocationInfo

public void setLocationInfo(java.lang.String f,
                            int l)
A convenience function to set the file and line number on the last result that was added.

Parameters:
f - The file name.
l - The line number.

moreMessages

public void moreMessages(java.lang.String msg)
Adds more messages to the last result.

Parameters:
msg - The message to be added.
